mapper.select: SELECT examroomexam.*,exam.ExamName,exam.ExamTime,exam.ExamLocation,exam.ExamDate,examroom.ExamRoomName,examroom.SeatCount FROM examroomexam LEFT JOIN exam ON examroomexam.examID=exam.ExamID LEFT JOIN examroom ON examroomexam.examRoomID=examroom.ExamRoomID

SELECT examroomexam.*,exam.ExamName,exam.ExamTime,exam.ExamLocation,exam.ExamDate,examroom.ExamRoomName,examroom.SeatCount FROM examroomexam LEFT JOIN exam ON examroomexam.examID=exam.ExamID LEFT JOIN examroom ON examroomexam.examRoomID=examroom.ExamRoomID where examroomexam.ereID=#{id}

SELECT examroomexam.*,exam.ExamName,exam.ExamTime,exam.ExamLocation,exam.ExamDate,examroom.ExamRoomName,examroom.SeatCount FROM examroomexam LEFT JOIN exam ON examroomexam.examID=exam.ExamID LEFT JOIN examroom ON examroomexam.examRoomID=examroom.ExamRoomID where exam.ExamName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
